li-dai.title: Handling errors the GraphQL way and adding more results to your queries
li-dai.description: We've updated response status codes and now allow up to 1000 results per query.

vendia-engineering.title: How Vendia leverages the AWS CDK to dynamically provision cloud infrastructure
vendia-engineering.description: How Vendia uses the AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) and AWS CloudFormation to dynamically provision cloud infrastructure on behalf of their customers.
